description: A free, distributed and user-friendly IRC / Twitter / XMPP / Campfire / JabbR client.
pre_install: if (installed 'gtk-sharp' $global) {Copy-Item "$(appdir gtk-sharp $global)\current\lib\gtk-sharp-2.0\*.dll" "$dir\" } else { error 'Please install `extras/gtk-sharp` first, then reinstall `extras/smuxi`.'}
